concern:
Not sure if anyone else feels this way but it can be a lonely journey in grad school especially because of the niche stresses, things we have to deal with. 

Created a group me that will hopefully foster some community for people to talk with one another and build some friendships or the very least camaraderie 

Here’s the link to join: You're invited to my new group 'Grad School Community' on GroupMe. Click here to join: https://groupme.com/join_group/86601776/iTupsbUn

dialogue_total.statement: Welcome! I'm glad you're here. Please feel free to share what's on your mind or any concerns you might have.
Hey, thanks for having me. I've just been feeling a bit isolated in grad school. It's like, even when I'm surrounded by people, the stress and workload make it hard to connect, you know?
That sounds really challenging. What do you think might change for you if you felt more connected during this time?

I think it would make a huge difference. Just having people to share experiences with, who understand what I'm going through, could really lighten the load. It would be nice not to feel so alone in all this.

Based on what you said, it sounds like building connections with others might be something worth focusing on. Possible options could include joining a study group or attending social events organized by your program. How do these ideas sound to you, or is there another direction you'd like to consider?

Yeah, those are good ideas, but sometimes it feels like everyone else is just as busy or stressed out. I started a GroupMe chat for grad students to try and create a space where we can connect more easily. It’s still new, but I hope it helps.

It sounds like you've already taken a meaningful step by starting that GroupMe chat, and that's a fantastic way to create a space for connection. Building on that, perhaps you could set a goal to regularly engage with the group, maybe by organizing a casual meetup or study session. Remember, it's important to be patient with yourself and others as you build these connections. Don't hesitate to lean on this chat as a supportive resource. You're doing great, and I'm here to support you in any way you need. Feel free to reach out as things progress or if you want to explore more ideas.
Thanks, I'll try to keep that in mind. It's just hard to stay motivated when it feels like everyone’s so busy.
